name: account_migration_reconcile_summary
description: This table summarizes the reconciliation of account migrations, detailing the success and discrepancies encountered during the process.

columns.name: run_date
columns.description: The date on which the reconciliation run was executed.

columns.name: run_timestamp
columns.description: The exact timestamp when the reconciliation run was executed.

columns.name: total_accounts
columns.description: The total number of accounts considered in the reconciliation process.

columns.name: successful_accounts
columns.description: The number of accounts that were successfully reconciled.

columns.name: missing_accounts
columns.description: The number of accounts that were not found during reconciliation.

columns.name: interest_code_mismatch_accounts
columns.description: The number of accounts with mismatched interest codes.

columns.name: interest_type_mismatch_accounts
columns.description: The number of accounts with mismatched interest types.

columns.name: success_percentage
columns.description: The percentage of accounts successfully reconciled.

columns.name: missing_percentage
columns.description: The percentage of accounts that were missing during reconciliation.

columns.name: interest_code_mismatch_percentage
columns.description: The percentage of accounts with interest code mismatches.

columns.name: interest_type_mismatch_percentage
columns.description: The percentage of accounts with interest type mismatches.
